item.title: Trump Gets It Right, but Can He Stick with It?
item.description: It seems Republican voters did not lose their taste for a confident, extroverted American presence on the world stage.

item.title: The End of a Scam
item.description: Biden was never a wonderful guy, and definitely not the savior of democracy, no matter what his media supporters said.

item.title: Green Energy Is Not So Green
item.description: As the footprint of ostensibly green energy expands, the negative environmental side effects loom larger.
